description: This repository contains flashcards for the SC 900 Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals exam. Each question is numbered, and you can click to reveal the answer.

questions.question: What is a feature of single sign-on (SSO)?

questions.question: What are types of distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks?
